bug.author: mrseeker
bug.description:
Describe the bug When I meet over 999 "friends", the screen tends to overflow To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Put in log that the pwnagotchi met over 999 friends Start in manual mode Check screen
Expected behavior When the pwnagotchi meets too many friends, just show 99+ or "too many" instead of the number, to prevent the screen from overflowing. Screenshots Unfortunately did not catch it on screenshot, update caused it to crash. Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version - 1.3.0 OS version - default Type of hardware - Waveshare v2 Any additional hardware used - N/A
Additional context Went out on quite a big run where it met too many accesspoints, +/- 1200 of them. When i came home, text was misaligned.
